text:
: Car driver A. Mohammed Ali (25) and its occupant S. Manikandan (27) of Oddanchathram in Dindigul district died in a road accident on Tiruchi – Karur national highway at Thindukarai near here on Friday.

Sources said the car which was on its way to Oddanchathram from Tiruchi collided head on with a lorry carrying blue metal and coming in the opposite direction at Thindukarai.

The car driver and the occupant died on the spot. The Jeeyapuram police have registered a case.
title: Two killed as car collides with lorry
